p:
Crude oil contamination affects the agriculture sector particularly due to soil toxicity and reduced plant growth. Crude oil causes environmental risks in the soil ecological system
16 , by inhibition of plant growth, damage to soil structure, disturbance of soil water quality, and so on
17 . The present research was designed to observe the remediation potential of a novel combined application treatment (pyrochar and thermal desorption) technique, thermal desorption alone, and pyrochar alone in the oil-polluted soil. We found that these methods are not only beneficial to remediate the soil but also capable to overcome the toxic nature of crude oil.
